name: Turbo
desc:
Turbo is an independent design studio/space based in Amman, Jordan run by Saeed Abu-Jaber &Mothanna Hussein.

Turbo provided the designs for the website and asked me to implement them on top of a simple backend. The website was built on top of KeystoneJS and the designs were ammended to make them adapt to different screen sizes.

name: Khammash Architects
desc: A multi-disciplinary architecture office based in Amman, Jordan. They are involved in numerous projects in Jordan,Oman, Palestine, Egypt, Syria and the UAE, ranging from master planning and urban design to sustainable tourism and destination design.The new website was built to showcase their work, research, and art pieces. Website design by Noura Salem.
